name: The echo in my room.
description:
The echo of my room repeats everything it hears, but there is a problem with what I say, honesty is not always part of my words, especially when I am alone. Words come and go, some get caught on the sheets, on the windows, on the curtains and in the mornings when I wake up, as I'm stumbling towards the bathroom, I bump into a few and wonder; did I say that? apparently I did, and that's what my bedroom echo is there for, to remind me what I was and make me question myself once again. 

The good thing is that when I clean, the words are gone, I am left with a blank sheet of paper to write on and as I realize the cycle of introspection that my words cause, I learn when to use them. 

The echo of my room one day broke me and since then I have not been able to put together all the pieces to put myself together again, the task is long and complex, but I get tired of putting together pieces of something I was, I want to be something new.
